sub_title: Global SC Strategies Business Partner at Unilever
summary:
Experienced (project)manager in FMCG and Water sector with a strong background in Lean Six Sigma and a focus on Improvement & Productivity.

Extensive experience in managing teams like; short term teams in Lean & Six Sigma projects. Long term teams in operations and logistics, customer service and collaboration. Managing experiences in- and outside The Netherlands. 

My key strengths are a strong combination in managing style between hard skills (finance, details and data) and soft skills (people, politics), a drive for results and focus on development and innovation (business and personal).
